Author: diana waggoner
Title: Sexual content in game
Body: The package arrived timely. However  this card game was more inappropriate than I expected. I was expecting it to be somewhat inappropriate from the reviews I read but it contained much more sexual questions and content that I expected.  I thought I researched enough but it was partly  my fault for not reviewing more information. In the proper setting and group these questions may be funny but not for a family.  I would not let my 17 yr old son play this game and did not want to play with my inlaws or mother!  My 23 yr old son may find it funny with his group of friends.  Just beware it includes alot of sexual content before your purchase.

Author: Judy
Title: You have to find sensitive people to play with to make it fun.
Body: Three generations of Texas women around the kitchen table...only had to hit wiki twice.  Otherwise we were attempting to make our answers make logical and logistics sense.  Not fun if you have these conversations with ease. But we did find the generation gap...come on 20 millennials catch up!! If they were play keys house parties in the 60's.

Author: Jared Nadel
Title: Did not like the game
Body: Bought it and played once and never again. Did not like the game.

Author: Eric Cole
Title: Two Stars
Body: Not as fun as I thought it would be.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Ehhh
Body: It was okay box kind of damaged and some cards were missing but overall ok experience

Author: tmack
Title: Two Stars
Body: This game is geared more for college aged kids, very sexually oriented.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Suck.
Body: I heard so much good things about this game. But it was missing so many cards the box was basically empty

Author: Dan High
Title: Pass
Body: Played this game for the first time on New Year's.  Some of the cards are extremely inappropriate, I expected that and generally those are the most humorous. We played with 4 people, there seemed to be a lot of dead time. At several points we decided to ditch an agreed amount of cards for fresh ones because they sucked so bad. Also at several points we decided to scrap the round because none of the cards were funny.  Game should come with some blank cards allowing players to create some of their own. 25$ is highway robbery for this glorified set of cards, and honestly I will probably never play again.

Author: Loren J. Erickson
Title: Age advisory says 17+ but I'd say 21+ (or older) is more like it. Some of the white cards are REALLY ...
Body: Wish I had looked at this more closely.  Age advisory says 17+ but I'd say 21+ (or older) is more like it.  Some of the white cards are REALLY off-color.  Seems like this deserves a warning label of some kind.

Author: Sydney McKim
Title: Two Stars
Body: Revived my box and it was literally crushed.

Author: Eddie Stardust
Title: Taking no real risks, the game plays itself.
Body: I anticipated irreverence and tastelessness, but I thought the game would allow for much more creativity. Instead, it opens up the opportunity to express dark, but rarely funny responses; hatefully good fun? The problem is that the game doesn't leave any room for a deeper engagement, nor does it allow players to inject their own humor. The mechanism disallows players to be accountable for espousing potentially horrid personal views, as they are prefabricated.By design, 'Cards Against Humanity' can't be funny, anymore so than can any  humor algorithm; it's just  too arbitrary. Playing is like being forced to watch poorly scripted television comedy of the 80's; the game plays itself.It's a dreary spectacle.

Author: Nadine
Title: Two Stars
Body: Lots of fun

Author: Chad Columbia
Title: A lot of doubles in mine
Body: Game is awesome but I'm giving it a 2 until I can get a new one mine had a bunch of doubles

Author: Dave Campbell
Title: Needs right mix to make game fun
Body: Concept is good but the game is too subjective.  You need the right mix of people to make the game interesting.  Without the right mix the game does not stand on its' own as entertainment.

Author: rian
Title: It is a good game but you need certain people to play it ...
Body: It is a good game but you need certain people to play it with. This game is not meant for everyone

Author: Tabatha
Title: Not for educated people .. dumb humor
Body: Eh, I've played this game with 3 sets of people and no one is liking it. It's boring high school humor.

Author: Just2peachy
Title: but we're very disappointed and found some of the question/answers
Body: We played with another couple. We were all excited about the reviews, but we're very disappointed and found some of the question/answers stupid

Author: Danny
Title: Low replay, get's old pretty quickly
Body: Brought this to work, was pretty fun the first time after playing like 15 rounds. Second time we played, it got kinda boring. I dont for see much replayability as the cards come up again and again.If they added more elements to it, it would be better. Other than just choosing answers and ending the actual 'playing' there

Author: Jerrold A. Heller
Title: Two Stars
Body: Less than stellar.

Author: Rachael_Inc
Title: Just okay
Body: Couldn't possibly be fun unless you're all high on mushrooms or cocaine. Even with a fair amount of drinking I found this 'game' to be pretty boring. Nobody else seemed to be having as much fun as other reviews seem to imply. I guess to each his own.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Expected better
Body: Not worth the money I spent. Played it once w friends. Once was okay. Wouldn't rush to play it again.

Author: BigPoppaWheelie
Title: Gets old
Body: Funny game first couple times you play but quickly gets old. There’s a ton of expansions to the game but I haven’t used any. Not for the prude or faint hearted. Most of my friends have all played it and the fun is worn out

Author: QueenB_mrsbarela
Title: Good
Body: Good

Author: Ty G
Title: Kind of boring after a while.
Body: Thought it would be funner

Author: Ebony N
Title: Not what I expected. Wanted to return it but ...
Body: Not what I expected.  Wanted to return it but didn't want to pay the fee.

Author: Catherine Goff
Title: Dirty cards
Body: Great game , many of the cards came dirty , very disappointed

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Cards falling apart
Body: It looked new but the cards were mostly tore up. It was a Christmas present so by the time it got used I was unable to return

Author: E.S
Title: Don't believe the hype!
Body: This game is Just o.k.  Definitely did not live up to all the hype.

Author: M. Siefken
Title: Fun, but
Body: I don't get what the hype is all about. I didn't giggle as much as I anticipated. Fun, but... Meh.

Author: amanda
Title: This set is boring. And some reviews say not authentic
Body: Played many times at bars with friends and remembered the cards being more out there and raunchy. This set is boring. And some reviews say not authentic?

Author: Erekle
Title: Under average for non Americans/Brits
Body: Nice party game, but card contents are mainly based on American/British Culture and unless you are too familiar with that you spend half the game time on Google. Even after you are confused whether other players (especially Card Czar) gets your point and you miss some opportunities to match cards. Despite there are 250 cards in a deck, after playing 3 or 4 times it becomes boring. Overall 4 stars for Americans/Brits, 2 stars for foreigners.

Author: jack of many trades
Title: Could be funnier!
Body: I'm not a prude and really expected this to be hilarious. Some cards were; however the majority, in my opinion, were just plain mean!

Author: Brandon F.
Title: It is a fun game, the first two times that it is ...
Body: It is a fun game, the first two times that it is played.  After that, the shock value wears off and it is repetitive and drab.  Much like a boat, it is better to know someone who owns it, than own it yourself.

Author: Cherish McNamara
Title: I really do but it wasn't as much fun as we thought it would be
Body: I get it. I really do but it wasn't as much fun as we thought it would be. We laughed but we've not picked up the game since playing it the first time. Not out favorite.

Author: M. Ogleari
Title: It's alright, gets super old
Body: This is the kind of game that's cool and interesting the first few times you play it, but gets very dull once you've seen most of the cards. The expansions attempt to keep it new and fresh, but there are so many other party games I recommend over this one. I guess it's fun to play with people who have never played it, so you can see their reactions to the cards. But that's about it.

Author: M. Athar
Title: Two Stars
Body: It relies on shock humor, but gets old after a few hours of playing

Author: D. Perez
Title: Fun but WAYYYY overrated
Body: Ok game to play a few times.  Gets old fast though.  Fun but WAYYYY overrated, don't expect too many playthroughs. Impossible to buy used or sell thanks to Amazon policy on this game.

Author: Di
Title: Too profound.
Body: Though I was aware this game was a bit ‘risky’, I didn’t care for it’s bold profanity. Just too offensive for my taste.

Author: JnKBos
Title: Not really suitable for everyone.
Body: Game isn’t for me. It is funnyish. But crude and not funny enough to overlook.

Author: Enaid13
Title: Disappointed
Body: Everyone was speaking about this game, and I didn't like it. It is just boring, sometime funny, but really you need alcohol to play....

Author: K2
Title: Funny until the cards go really south
Body: Funny until the cards go really south!  I wish I would have researched this a bit more prior to purchasing.

Author: Wendy Golik
Title: It was good but not nearly as great as the reviews and ...
Body: It was good but not nearly as great as the reviews and all the talk about how fun and funny it was to play!

Author: Amazon Maineiac
Title: Not for the faint at heart
Body: If you like drunken party games

Author: Brithia22
Title: It’s funny but some is not
Body: This is a very fun game but there are a few cards that will literally turn your stomach and say “Why?!!” They are that bad. Some things you just don’t joke about or if you do then you’re sick. I’m sorry but I don’t find “dead babies” funny at all. That card will go in the trash. I get that the creator wanted to push the envelope to make this an epic fun game but some things are just not funny and ticked me off.

Author: junni
Title: Game for terrible people.
Body: After a few months of this game. its just meh...the jokes get old quickly and even with the new packs. i feel this is a good game for new friends, but after a few rounds, thats it.

Author: Kevin S.
Title: Cringy game
Body: I've only used this game twice and most of my friends think it's cringy

Author: Anna D. Brown
Title: Two Stars
Body: Highly inappropriate.

Author: John W. Davenport
Title: Definitely Not for Children!
Body: Should be X rated.  We had to censor ours before playing a second time.

Author: Mercedes Harris
Title: I do like the game but they send me a box with ...
Body: I do like the game but they send me a box with a bunch of double cards. so I am pretty much playing with half of the box instead of the whole thing. I had to order another box from the company.

Author: Isabelle Forman
Title: Anti-Semetic
Body: This card game was really fun until I saw cards that promote anti-semetic jokes. NOT O.K.

Author: bjsinn
Title: I had been telling her how funny and sick the game is
Body: We have owned Cards against Humanity for awhile now and I sent this version to s friend as a hostess gift (old college roommate).  I had been telling her how funny and sick the game is.  Was I surprised when it was so tame.  The cards were funny but nothing like in my version at home.  It was boring because we weren't laughing as hard as usual.  Not sure if people complained so much they PG rated it or what but I was very disappointed.

Author: Veronica
Title: Name should have tipped me off. Very crude content.
Body: These cards go too far. I bought online as a Christmas gift, but returned as soon as I saw what some of the cards said. Far too much sexual content. Not a fan of crude games. Guess the name should have tipped me off though

Author: Brenton
Title: I am just not into that kind of funny.
Body: It's an ok game.  It's like apples to apples if a couple of drunk perverted college kids wrote the questions and answers.  It is very cheap and generic in appearance, the cards kind of look homemade.  I played it once and gave it away.

Author: vinny tee
Title: They took out some cards that a few people complained ...
Body: They took out some cards that a few people complained about and said were offensive. That's right. The game is supposed to be offensive, and the creators caved when someone *gasp* got offended.

Author: Menthia Carpenter
Title: Not much different from Apples to Apples
Body: Not much different from Apples to Apples except for the crudeness.  Wanted to like this from reading the reviews but everyone that played kept saying it's like Apples to Apples but with vulgarity added.

Author: chris romano
Title: Apples to Apples is kind of a lame party game to begin with
Body: Apples to Apples is kind of a lame party game to begin with. Making the responses edgy only helps it for a little while. The shock value is minimal and wears off pretty quickly. I played a game with friends. By the time we were done, I knew I'd probably never play again.

Author: JanelleB
Title: People say this is so much fun. I don't really think it is
Body: People say this is so much fun. I don't really think it is. it's kind of lame, loaded questions is way better

Author: Laura Herlant
Title: Too crudely sexual and vulgar to be funny. Feels so forced.
Body: We bought this game due to its popularity and because my friend group is always big into new card games or board games. We are big fans of the Apples to Apples card game, which works the same way but is not targeted to adult audiences. I was excited to try this card game since it allows for more salty content and unpolitically correct hands. However, after opening the card deck and reading the phrases, I was very disappointed at how blatantly vulgar and sexual most of the cards are. It seems far to forced and doesn't allow for the fun and nuance of making your own jokes by the choice of card play. As a result, I've had it for over 2 years now and it has never been selected as the game to play. I'm almost a little embarrassed I own it.The construction quality of the card box and the card lamination is excellent, so really the bad review is about the quality of the content, not the quality of the construction of the game.

Author: Alex
Title: Mediocre at best
Body: It is okay. I heard tons of hype about this game and it didn't live up to expectations. Some of the answer cards are just dumb and lack creativity. Reminded me of playing madlibs w a child trying to be funny.

Author: Avid reader
Title: Would be a great game if it wasn't so raunchy
Body: The product itself is good quality, but the content shocked me. This game is hilarious - a total hoot to play, but the raunchy content ruins it. This would be a great game if the designers would clean it up a bit. As it is, I wouldn't even play it with my teens. Adults only.

Author: Jesse Felder
Title: good
Body: very good

Author: Bronx Baby
Title: our group was bored after the second or third game
Body: I mean really? all these positive reviews for what? our group was bored after the second or third game...

Author: Prometeo
Title: Two Stars
Body: Not polite

Author: Steven Newman
Title: Ridiculously crude, and fun for a while.
Body: It's really easy to play, and can be incredibly hilarious. Best played while under the influence of alcohol, in a large group of uncouth rogues.EDIT:I'm changing my review from 4 stars, to 2. I had a lot of fun with this at first, but it lost it's luster for me very quickly.This game is hilarious the first few times you play it, but got old for me real fast. It essentially boils down to whoever gets the nastiest card wins the round, regardless of context.It will always be fun to watch people reading cards for the first time, but I don't think I'll ever voluntarily play this game again.

Author: Eric Beck
Title: They are funny but....
Body: They are a cheep knock off. The still shuffle ok, but beware of any drink rings. These are like paper towels.

Author: Glendale
Title: I didn't realize it was a dirty sex-oriented game unsuitable for Families!  LOL
Body: Let me say there is nothing whatsoever wrong with this card game -- it's just that I didn't look carefully and purchased it for family get-togethers.  My young-adult kids were hysterical with laughter when they saw it.  It's absolutely filthy dirty stuff -- not family fare.  Great for young adults.  People over 50 looking for fun group games just pass on this one.

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Two Stars
Body: I thought it would be fun, but it's a little too gross for me!

Author: Irene
Title: Disturbing
Body: Truly a game made for it's shock value.  Definitely an adult's only game which some players enjoyed, myself not included as I found some content disturbing.  Will be reselling this game on Amazon.

Author: BN Normal
Title: Many Better Options
Body: I'd liken this game to a teenager learning to drive a car.  Fun for them at first but gets old quickly.  I enjoyed my first time playing Cards Against Humanity but it got old quickly.  The problem with this game is that the dirtiest played card always seems to win no matter what the topic is so the people I've played with ALWAYS play their dirtiest card.  In addition, the game lacks replayability within the same group because their is a limit to the number of cards and topics.  Combine these two elements and you have a board game you can only play a couple of times with any sort of enthusiasm.  If you have the same circle of friends and are looking for a party game, I'd suggest looking at something else.

Author: Merandah Hernandez
Title: Great product but arrived damaged
Body: This product is hilarious and great for parties! I’ve played Cards Against Humanity with friends and I always wanted to own my own for when I am the host in my own home. The package was delivered in a timely manner. However, some of the cards were damaged within the box and torn on the corners. It was not damaged in shipping as the outside of the box was pristine. I would recommend to anyone buying this product to go in person and buy it in a store to ensure that the product is not damaged.

Author: D. Boetscher
Title: SHOULD BE ADULT ONLY!
Body: This game is definitely not for people under 18 or not even under 21.  A lot of vulgarity.  It should be listed as Adults only.

Author: SamIAm
Title: Two Stars
Body: Loses its appeal quickly. We were neither overly entertained, nor shocked.

Author: Joan S Heady
Title: Two Stars
Body: Don't understand how this has gotten so many 5 star ratings.

Author: Brian K. Lee
Title: I might have thought this was a great game for a frat party
Body: Um, not what I thought it was. I'm a little embarrassed that I even purchased it. Rude, graphic, and over-the-toplanguage. I might have thought this was a great game for a frat party, but too many years have passed since then.

Author: Pegasus
Title: Two Stars
Body: bought for a kid across the street.....stupid

Author: steph
Title: Two Stars
Body: Game is awesome. However. My box came damaged. Totally broken.

Author: Amy
Title: Two Stars
Body: I wish there was a 2 player version

Author: vaterps71
Title: Two Stars
Body: Get the new editions.  These cards are basically rated PG

Author: Amazon addict
Title: If you like shocking and inappropriate games, you might like this.  I'm not a fan.
Body: The quality of the cards is very good.  Box is sturdy.  The idea for the game is interesting.  I'm just not a fan of the game.  It's definitely a game for teens and/or 20 something age range.  Although beware, many of the cards have very adult material.  It can be a little shocking and sick.  I think the developers intended that.  Once you get past that, there is really not much substance to the game and it becomes quite boring.  I don't think the add on's are worth the extra money you spend.  The main game isn't worth the money either.  The game is very subjective as the person judging is doing so in a completely subjective fashion, usually simply based on their own personal perspectives.  I think it is a fad.  Keep in mind, the seller is good and the product quality is fine.  It's the game itself that my review is based on.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: If you're wanting it in two days I wouldn't recommend buying it
Body: Order this product on a Monday,selected the two day shipping option, and it is set to arrive on Friday, this is not two days. If you're wanting it in two days I wouldn't recommend buying it, but this is an extremely fun game if you're into crude humor. Do not buy this for your younger kids

Author: Cehuerta
Title: I received my item today, and it is what ...
Body: I received my item today, and it is what I ordered. However, the box has been cut all the way through on one side. Cards can slip out of it. I didn't pay $20+ for a card game for the box to be messed up and cards to get lost.

Author: Jennifer
Title: Needs better cards
Body: The cards in this box, really are not up to par. You should order a few expansion packs to go with this.

Author: Stacy Morris
Title: XXX  Go thru the cards before daring to play with those you respect.
Body: Some of the answers are demeaning to humans.

Author: Marygene
Title: Brash
Body: Not for kind at heart

Author: Elvis Garcia
Title: Got old too fast
Body: It got old after a couple play throughs.

Author: J. Butler
Title: Worth a few laughs once or twice. We took ...
Body: Worth a few laughs once or twice. We took it with us on a trip to try with friends. We left it there. Expensive for a few marginal laughs.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Two Stars
Body: Love the game but box came damaged and now it's hard to store.

Author: Daniel H.
Title: I'm just not a fan of this game after trying ...
Body: I'm just not a fan of this game after trying it out... gave it to my sister.  Cards looked used and damaged.

Author: Tristan Sanders
Title: Product was damaged when it arrived it looked like the box was dropped
Body: Product was damaged when it arrived it looked like the box was dropped, hard to fit the cards back in

Author: Customer
Title: Two Stars
Body: This game is funny the first few times but definetly gets boring really fast. Definetly overpriced as well

Author: Brittany Anderson
Title: Two Stars
Body: This came a week after expected. That's why rating is low.

Author: Joy
Title: A bit misled
Body: My brother, (whom this was bought for) wanted a set and so I purchased them for him, and as you might imagine, I was a little upset to find that this is one box, not two as shown in the photo. Had I known that, I would have purchased one of the others that are only $10. Personally, I feel a bit cheated, but I suppose there's nothing to do but take it as it is.I had a chance to play with my brother and I think the game itself is quite fun, addictive, and plain hilarious. It let's you know how twisted you truly are. I would have rated this higher, but adding my comment above, my palate has been tainted a bit, after this experience.

Author: Jack I. Johnson
Title: Two Stars
Body: Horrible, nasty game!

Author: LtAt
Title: Maybe it was who I was playing with, but ...
Body: Maybe it was who I was playing with, but this game was not as exciting as I thought it was going to be.

Author: Mayra
Title: Great game..damaged cards
Body: The game is great, but some of the cards were damaged. not happy about that.

Author: Drjones
Title: Meh
Body: Too vulgar. Could be very funny without going to that extent.

Author: Maypother
Title: not good
Body: the box damage!!!!

Author: JOHN
Title: Don't buy it
Body: The game is as advertised but many of the questions seemed useless.  I would not repeat, Not recommended

Author: Christina
Title: I was happy with it but I was not happy that the ...
Body: I was happy with it but I was not happy that the box was almost completely destroyed when I got it. Like it had been thrown around and crushed by bigger stuff.

Date: Platinum Plan or higher is required in order to access reviews beyond 100'.
